diagramViews

Class DiagramView

  • java.lang.Object
    • diagramViews.ObjectShape
      • diagramViews.DiagramView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.util.EventListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CommView, SequenceView

    public abstract class DiagramView
extends ObjectShape
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    A class representing the Diagram view.
    Author:
    Afraz Salim
